data.title: Niantic, Inc.: Privacy contact details · datarequests.org
data.meta_description: Privacy email: dpo@nianticlabs.com, Address: 1 Ferry Building Suite 200, San Francisco, CA 94111, United States of America
data.text:
We have the following contact information on “Niantic, Inc.” for you to use for privacy-related requests:

Address:

Niantic, Inc.

Attn: Data Protection

1 Ferry Building Suite 200

San Francisco

CA 94111

United States of America

Category: entertainment

“Niantic, Inc.” is also responsible for the following entities and services:

Niantic International Limited

Pokémon GO

Ingress

Harry Potter: Wizards Unite
